name: integratingprojectdh
description: This is the final project for Full Stack Web Development course from Digital House. Our project consists in creating a webpage for a jewerly store. The products to be offered are earings, neckless, rings, jewerly, etc. Our tarjet customer are women, who like to wear accesories, which make them look prettier.
author: Alfredo Garcia, Leonardo Villarreal , Jorge Ortiz
